sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthhttpmonloginfo ( sys_id , site_url , websvc_knd , http_sttus_code , creat_dt , log_info , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #sysId# , #siteUrl# , #websvcKnd# , #httpSttusCode# , #creatDt# , #logInfo# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthhttpmonloginfo SET sys_id = #sysId# , site_url = #siteUrl# , websvc_knd = #websvcKnd# , http_sttus_code = #httpSttusCode# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , log_info = #logInfo# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_id = #sysId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthhttpmonloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_id = #sysId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sys_id , site_url , websvc_knd , http_sttus_code , creat_dt , log_info , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM COMTHHTTPMONLOGINFO WHERE sys_id = #sysId# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.SYS_ID , A.SITE_URL , A.WEBSVC_KND , A.HTTP_STTUS_CODE , A.CREAT_DT , A.LOG_INFO , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT SYS_ID , SITE_URL , WEBSVC_KND , HTTP_STTUS_CODE , CREAT_DT , LOG_INFO , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LOG_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTHHTTPMONLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SYS_ID = #searchKeyword#
SITE_URL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SYS_ID DESC , LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHHTTPMONLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SYS_ID = #searchKeyword#
SITE_URL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
